mapper.select: SELECT d.user_name, a.* FROM attendance a JOIN euser_detail d ON d.user_num = a.emp_id WHERE a.emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY a.attendance_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance( attendance_id, emp_id, work_date, scheduled_in_time, scheduled_out_time, status, work_type, check_in_time, check_out_time, notes, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( attendance_seq.nextval, #{empId}, #{workDate}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 09:00', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 18:00', #{status}, #{workType}, #{checkIntime}, #{checkOuttime}, #{notes}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
